name: Crazy Smoothie Maker
description:
Welcome in this fresh new smoothie bar! Our cute customers can't wait to taste your delicious drinks. Thanksfully, you can count on the "Smoothie Maker", a revolutionnary robot able to provide you the required fruits with his fantastic wheel.

Careful, the robot is a prototype, and can be a little unpredictable! But we are sure it will be okay! Good luck!

(We will probably release some updates to this game in a near future!)

Use Z to incorporate in your mixer the fruit on the wheel pointed by the arrow.
Click on the "MIX!" button on your mixer to create the smoothie. 

Game created for the HedgeJam #4

  Developper: Marion POBELLE (Vitamin)

  Art: Marisa SUTACHUN (Marizhat) / Yann CHATILA (Maerys)

  Sound: Valentin GUYARD (Tivah)

  Game Design: Yann CHATILA (Maerys) / Esteban IMBEAUD (Ratchet Uroriginal) 

Fonts : 

  • Donitha: https://www.dafont.com/donitha.font
  • Sunday Smoothie: https://www.dafont.com/sunday-smoothie.font
  • Cute Bubble: https://www.dafont.com/cute-bubble.font
  • Crazy Rich: https://www.dafont.com/crazy-rich.font
